summary: Implemented spec 08 - Scenario 3 Notifications with real-time payment notification subscription using NWC client.subscribeNotifications(). Bob can start/stop listening for notifications and see incoming payments in real-time. Alice can send quick payments via Lightning Address.
decisions: Used existing NotificationEvent and NotificationType types from spec 02
Used useLightningAddressPayment from spec 07 for QuickPayButtons
Added data-testid attributes to all interactive elements for E2E testing
Added ARIA attributes (role, aria-label) for accessibility compliance
Kept notifications list to max 50 items as specified
Auto-refresh balance on payment_received and payment_sent events
